title: Introverts and Extroverts
description: Are you an introvert or an extrovert? You may be an ambivert! Understanding how we interact with others, process information, and feel energized can be important information for leading a satisfying life. Introverts and Extroverts provides students with important information about the strengths and challenges of being an introvert and being an extrovert. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast and the proper use of commas in a series.
